heading: Penalty for work without permit on one or two-family dwelling
text:
Where work has been performed without a
   permit on a one-family or two-family dwelling the penalty shall equal four times the amount of the fee payable for the permit.
   Where only part of the work has been performed without a permit, the penalty shall be reduced proportionately according to the
   amount of work still to be performed at the time a permit is issued. Notwithstanding the foregoing, no such penalty shall be less
   than five hundred dollars.
